name: Search and Rescue (itch)
description:
Billy, the infamous Search & Rescue operator receives a report on a missing person in the Bermuda's. All he knows that the last time he was in contact with civilization was 8 days ago. While exploring the last know location of the missing man - Billy comes across an island. He quickly notices that he island is not marked on the map. There is chance that the missing man survived and is stranded on the island and there is only one way to find out. BTW - Controls: Move - WASD || Reload - R || Flashlight - F || Jump - Space || RMB - Aim || LMB - Shoot || --- We recommend to play on higher end PC ---

(Made by Wedl3 NakteIam and Kami in 48h For GGJ 2021)
